task_description: Cleaning slab before starting the next construction stage
Brick masonry, layout, and alignment work
Internal and external wall plastering with cement mortar
Plaster of Paris finishing work on walls and ceilings
Installation of electrical conduits and boxes prior to wiring
Waterproofing of wet areas including toilets, balconies, and terraces
Plumbing pipe installation, outlets, and fittings setup
Floor tiling works including surface leveling and joint finishing
Wall tiling works for bathrooms, kitchens, and utility areas
Skirting tile fixing along the floor edges
Granite countertop and sill fixing works
Installation of door frames including alignment and fixing
Installation of door shutters, handles, and locks
Fixing window and sliding door frames
Installation of window shutters and sliding panels
Installation of sanitary and CP fittings across bathrooms and kitchens
Electrical wiring, switchboard setup, and fixture fitting
Surface preparation, primer, and painting with final touchups
Final cleaning and handover preparation of the flat/unit
